function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decline in tourism revenue and disrupted trade routes leading to economic losses, poverty, and resource use","Impact":"Increased poverty and unsustainable resource use, fragmentation of habitats, cascading impacts on biodiversity conservation","Mitigation":"Diversification of sources of income, investment in sustainable resource management, support for impacted communities","Technologies":"Sustainable resource management technologies, community development technologies, economic diversification technologies","People":"Communities relying on tourism revenue and trade routes","Owner":"Local government, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Consequences of declines in tourism and trade resulting from COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Likely economic turmoil and cascading biodiversity impacts, observed severe economic losses","Mitigation":"Diversification of sources of income, support for impacted communities, investment in conservation monitoring and enforcement","Technologies":"Community development technologies, economic diversification technologies, conservation monitoring technologies","People":"Communities reliant on tourism and trade, conservation organizations","Owner":"Local government, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Reduction in conservation monitoring and enforcement capacity due to restricted movements and postponed funding","Impact":"Inability to determine the impacts of the pandemic on local wildlife and people","Mitigation":"Investment in remote monitoring technologies, allocation of emergency funding for conservation monitoring and enforcement","Technologies":"Remote monitoring technologies, emergency funding technologies","People":"Local wildlife, communities reliant on conservation efforts","Owner":"Conservation organizations, local government"}]}
